com.pivotal.pxf

Class PxfUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pivotal.pxf.PxfUnit

  • public abstract class PxfUnit
extends Object
    This abstract class contains a number of helpful utilities in developing a PXF extension for HAWQ. Extend this class and use the various assert methods to check given input against known output.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PxfUnit.LocalInputData
      An extension of InputData for the local file system instead of HDFS.
      static class  PxfUnit.Pair<FIRST,SECOND>

      • getExtraParams

        public List<PxfUnit.Pair<String,String>> getExtraParams()
        Get any extra parameters that are meant to be specified for the "pxf" protocol. Note that "X-GP-" is prepended to each parameter name.
        Returns:
        Any extra parameters or null if none.

      • getColumnDefinitions

        Returns:

      • getAllOutput

        protected List<String> getAllOutput(com.pivotal.pxf.api.ReadAccessor accessor,
                        com.pivotal.pxf.api.ReadResolver resolver)
                             throws Exception
        Opens the accessor and reads all output, giving it to the resolver to retrieve the list of fields. These fields are then added to a string, delimited by commas, and returned in a list.
        Parameters:
        accessor - The accessor instance to use
        resolver - The resolver instance to use
        Returns:
        The list of output strings
        Throws:
        Exception
